titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the forty-sixth anniversary of the renewal of Ukrainian independence, June 30, 1987, as "Ukrainian Independence Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Designates June 30, 1987, as Ukrainian Independence Day.
